user_query: way and pass them shits immediately and then you get Hostel that now says you're stuck in the US fuck you are never traveling abroad after this I always appreciate a horror film that can Prey Upon somebody's paranoia or prey upon somebody's fears and give the most sick embodiment of what that person was fearing whether it was irrational or not and I think Hostel is one of the best movies at achieving that and I also think the way and the pace at which they kind of reveal what is actually going on in this movie as far as the plot and the situation that these guys are getting themselves in to I think it's done pretty well as far as building tension slowly introducing you to all these different red flags and slowly building this very uneasy feeling of dread to where I mean the first part of the movie is just a bunch of dudes partying a bunch of dudes just hanging out being obnoxious guys and then slowly Oli disappears The King of the Swing you get these ominous little text messages and these pictures that just don't quite look right all the way up to the point where Josh is taken and he wakes up in that chair you feel like something is really not right with this scenario something is not right with this hostel something is not right with this city or this town and even after you see one of the two main characters bite it you get this line of dialogue right at the end where he offers to pay the guy that's going to kill him and he says nobody's paying me I'm paying them and

entities.entity_description: Hostel은 해외 여행에 대한 공포와 편집증을 자극하는 호러 영화로, 파티를 즐기던 젊은이들이 끔찍한 상황에 빠지는 내용을 다룬다. 긴장감을 천천히 쌓아가며 불길한 징조들을 점진적으로 보여주는 방식으로 전개된다
Oli는 Hostel에서 'King of the Swing'이라 불리는 인물로, 영화 중반에 실종된다
Josh는 Hostel의 두 주인공 중 한 명으로, 납치되어 의자에 묶인 채 깨어나며 결국 죽음을 맞이하는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Oli는 Hostel에 등장하는 캐릭터로 실종되는 인물이다
Josh는 Hostel의 주인공 중 한 명으로 납치되어 살해당한다
Oli와 Josh는 함께 여행하는 친구들로, Oli가 먼저 실종된 후 Josh도 납치된다
